name: Arrows and Pointers
description:
Instructions are presented in the beginning of the game.

contains 10 levels, an arrow, "pointers" and music.

Music made using Bosca Ceoil, some images (like the thumbnail) using GIMP, but mostly Scratch. 

I hope you enjoy!

I originally made this game in Scratch, you can find it here:  https://scratch.mit.edu/projects/530555184/
